column1: Hey, so I think we should stop seeing each other. No hard feelings, just different vibes. ✌️
I think we’ve both known this isn’t working. Time to move on, but no bad blood. 🖤
You're amazing, but I don’t see this going anywhere. Hope we both find our best match!
I think it’s best if we part ways. No drama, just doing what’s right for us both.
No cap, I just don’t feel the spark anymore. Wishing you all the best tho!
